thread.section_title: BookIt.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of BookIt.com | bookit.com | 4 of 697
thread.title: Karaey Davis

author: Karaey Davis
title: Karaey Davis
text: I honestly had the smoothest process with Bookit.com. my customer rep Jeremy was awesome. He assisted my friends and I on separate occasions; thoroughly explaining everything for me and making it his priority to give me the best deal possible. He was very capable of answering every single detailed and annoying question that I had. Such a great booking site.
